actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to name the building known as the Library of Congress Annex to be the Library of Congress Thomas Jefferson Building.

summary.text: Directs that the building in the block bounded by East Capitol Street, Second Street Southeast, Third Street Southeast, and Pennsylvania Avenue Southeast, in the District of Columbia (commonly known as the Library of Congress Annex), shall hereafter be known as the "Library of Congress Thomas Jefferson Building".

titles.title: A bill to name the building known as the Library of Congress Annex to be the Library of Congress Thomas Jefferson Building.
